name: @safe-global/protocol-kit
description: SDK to interact with Safe smart contracts

scripts.test:ganache:web3:v1.0.0: export TEST_NETWORK=ganache && export ETH_LIB=web3 && export SAFE_VERSION=1.0.0 && hardhat --network localhost deploy && nyc hardhat --network localhost test

scripts.unbuild: rimraf dist artifacts deployments cache .nyc_output typechain *.tsbuildinfo
scripts.build: yarn unbuild && hardhat compile && yarn typechain && yarn safe-deployments && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.build.json
